mapper.select: Select operator_code ,operator_name ,operator_sex ,operator_pwd ,operator_upper ,operator_level ,operator_state ,operator_company ,operator_rgn_type ,case when o.operator_level = 'admin' then 0 when o.operator_level = 'normal' then 1 when o.operator_level = 'readMan' then 2 when o.operator_level = 'viewMan' then 3 end AS operatorLevelCode ,case when a.areano is not null then a.areano when n.id is not null then n.id when o.operator_rgn_type = 'all' then '' else '-1' end AS rgnAndAreaId From ha_operator o left join ha_rgn n on n.name = o.operator_name left join ha_area a on a.name = o.operator_name Where operator_code = #{uid} limit 1

select * from ( select operator_code, operator_company, case when operator_company = '镇江水司' then 'sys_zjss' when operator_company = '泰州水司' then 'sys_tzss' when operator_company = '南通燃气' then 'sys_ntrq' when operator_company = '鹤山水司' then 'sys_hsss' when operator_company = '浦口水司' then 'sys_pkss' when operator_company = '融安水司' then 'sys_rass' when operator_company = '句容水司' then 'sys_jrss' when operator_company = '湖南成聪' then 'sys_hncc' when operator_company = '宁远水司' then 'sys_nyss' when operator_company = '安徽全椒' then 'sys_ahqj' when operator_company = '河池水司' then 'sys_hcss' when operator_company = '武汉易维' then 'sys_whyw' when operator_company = '郁南水务' then 'sys_ynsw' when operator_company = '巴南水司' then 'sys_bnss' when operator_company = '大竹水司' then 'sys_dzss' when operator_company = '新田水司' then 'sys_xtss' when operator_company = '获嘉水司' then 'sys_hjss' when operator_company = '三川邵阳' then 'sys_scsy' when operator_company = '三川景德镇' then 'sys_scjdz' when operator_company = '东莞相思鸟' then 'sys_dgxsn' when operator_company = '华龙仪表' then 'sys_hlyb' when operator_company = '佛山威星' then 'sys_fswx' when operator_company = '广东韶关' then 'sys_gdsg' end AS operatorCompanyId from ha_operator ) t where (operator_code = #{id} or #{id} = 'ha') and operatorCompanyId is not null
select id from ha_rgn where name = #{operatorName}
select areano from ha_area where name = #{operatorName}
